inclusion.criterion: Histological diagnosis of Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No central nervous system involvement by lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No more than 1 prior cycle of R-CHOP chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 1 adverse International Prognostic Index factor at diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adverse Prognosis = Stage 3 or 4 and elevated LDH
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No more than one prior cycle of R-CHOP chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No central nervous system involvement by lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Histological diagnosis other than Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent use of other anti-cancer therapies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other serious co-morbid illness that would compromise study participation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior malignancy unless non-melanoma skin cancer, carcinoma in-situ of the cervix (CIN) or breast, or malignancy treated more than 5 years previously with no evidence of recurrent disease since initial treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than 1 prior cycle of Rituximab, cyclophosphamide, or doxorubicin.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. They have a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter and are currently on ditropan.
